Игра, где ты заходя в игру молишься, чтобы против тебя не было читаков и смурфов. А за твою команду играют челики, которые не понимают, что происходит и ливают после пары раундов. Не советую людям, у которых нет успокоительных и железных нервов.

I have been obsessed with counter strike games since childhood. I  liked Counter Strike: Condition Zero for the first time.  I started playing Counter Strike: Global Offensive  from March 2022.  I've been writing this review only  after I've experienced the game. There is nothing in this game that can force you to leave the game and get up. This game is so addictive that it can harm your health. You may be able to understand my point, but at the same time there is also a complaint that no action is taken even after the developers  report to hackers and cheaters in the game, due to which I feel like uninstalling this game. In competitive games, I can’t see the gameplay of other players , due to which they are successful  in cheating such as aimhack, wallhac, trigger bot, no recoil etc.  No mechanism has been developed by this game to prevent cheats. Despite being reported by the players, no consideration is given to them, which is extremely regrettable. According to me, if any action is taken against the cheaters in this game, then there will hardly be a more addictive. game than this.
